column1: '''Wedmath''' is the eighth month of the [[Shire Calendar]]
column2: following [[Afterlithe]] and approximately corresponding to modern [[24 July]] through [[22 August]].<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

column1: The name represents a [[Hobbitish|modernization]] of the [[Old English]] name for August
column3: meaning "grass-month" (cf. ''weed'').<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.forodrim.org/daeron/md_smn.html|articlename=The Shire month-names|author=[[Arden R. Smith]]|website=[http://www.forodrim.org/daeron Mellonath Daeron - The Language Guild of the Forodrim]}}</ref><ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.) ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]''
